analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x302f9e522fe5098a3e1796d7fad9032be6a9c9fe.sol:
	Contract CoinMetroVault has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x302f9e522fe5098a3e1796d7fad9032be6a9c9fe.sol#253-254)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

CoinMetroVault.release (/unique_chucks/34/0x302f9e522fe5098a3e1796d7fad9032be6a9c9fe.sol#258-259) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(masterWallet,balance) (/unique_chucks/34/0x302f9e522fe5098a3e1796d7fad9032be6a9c9fe.sol)
